body:
My configuration: Processor: 3.10 GHz RAM: 8 GB Windows 7 (64 bit) Android Studio 2.2.2 Java 1.8

I try the next solutions, but this is not help me.

  1. File->Settings->Plugins and disable the following things:

CVS Integration, Git Integration, GitHub, Google Cloud Tools for Android Studio, Subversion Integration

  1. gradle.properties org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx2048M

  2. studio.exe.vmoptions -server -Xms1024m -Xmx4096m -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=256m -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:SoftRefLRUPolicyMSPerMB=50

But when I start emulator its take very much RAM , and as result my computer work VERY slow.

This is screenshot when emulator was started
title: Android studio takes too much memory
